As a highly skilled full-stack software engineer, I possess a profound passion for the art of website design. With my extensive expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I have the exceptional ability to craft websites from the ground up. These websites I create are not only visually captivating, but also exhibit remarkable robustness and scalability.

Projects

Media Discovery Application

Flick Finder

The Flick Finder application is built using React JavaScript, the YouTube API, and The Movie Database (TMDb) API. It allows users to discover top movies, TV shows, and trending content. The application features a search function for easily finding desired movies and TV shows. Each movie and TV show poster includes YouTube trailers. The process involves setting up a React project, installing dependencies, obtaining API keys, creating React components, fetching data from the TMDb API, displaying posters, implementing search functionality, fetching YouTube trailers using the movie or TV show titles as search queries, embedding the trailers in the application, and styling the user interface.

June 2023 - Present

Instagram Clone

Instargam

A 3-person team based application to replicate and create a functional social media platform similar to Instagram, allowing users to share photos and interact with each other's posts utlizing React as our front-end framework and Python, Django, and PostgreSQL for our back-end.

March 2023 - April 2023

Messenger Application

Late Text

A 3-person team created a text messaging application that leverages a like-minded quiz with a kink-based focus to generate scores based on user responses. By utilizing this unique approach, we match users with similar interests, promoting more engaging and personalized conversations.

March 2023 - April 2023

Interests

As a web developer, I have a strong passion for both the digital world and the beauty of nature. When I'm not busy coding and designing, I love exploring peaceful places and being amazed by nature's wonders. Whether it's going on hikes to see waterfalls, wandering through the lush forests of the Pacific Northwest, or cross country roadtrips.

Besides my love for nature, I also enjoy diving into fantasy, science fiction, action movies and TV shows or books. Some of my favorite movies and TV shows are The Fifth Element, Game of Thrones, The Witcher, and Avatar. SOme of my favorite aurthors are Sarah J. Maas, Jennifer L. Armentrout and Caroline Peckham.
